name: Old Game Maker Collection
description:
Wanna see the embarrassing start of a game developer? Check it all out as I tried to archive my older Game Maker games for the whole internet to enjoy!

(If you can find "Patrick dans vol au dessus d'un nid de méduses" I'd really appreciate it but for now, it seems like it's lost to time)

This pack includes:

- Busty Bunny Race: Mash the space bar as fast as you can

- Conman Adventures: My first game starring silly stickmen!

- Lakitu's Challenge: Dodge the falling spinies for as long as you can!

- Machinbidule Party: Collection of minigames, my first BIG project at the time that had to be scrapped because of Game Maker's limitations

- Patrick Spationaute: Play Patrick's latest adventure to the outer space!

- Minigame Fever, Minigame Mania & Un Party Game: Collection of short minigames, play them all in quick succession and score as high as you can!!

AND an exclusive demo of my latest fangame (at the time) Mario & Sonic at the 2018 Olympic Winter Games with Snowboard Slalom, Downhill Skiing and Snowball Fight.
